movie.title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
movie.plot: The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1972.

events.title: five men break into DNC headquarters at the Watergate Complex
